name: Darius Cozmic Collection
summary:
Darius Cozmic Collection is a compilation of four arcade titles, those being Darius, Darius II, Sagaia, and Darius Gaiden. It was released for the Nintendo Switch in Japan on February 28, 2019. A limited pre-order run was made available worldwide on November 24, 2019.

The special edition includes five additional titles, as well as the arrange CD Darius the Omnibus II, an updated version of Darius Odyssey subtitled Cozmic Archives, and miniature acrylic marquees for the four included arcade titles.
